Great and attentive! …

Name: Vergulde Gaper
Review Text: The food was very good and we were in a rush and so the service was quick and server was very nice. My burger was fantastic, and I would definitely get it again. A few of the ravioli were slightly undercooked and tough but I think that was our fault for rushing it due to our time constraint. Everything was delicious.

Name: Vergulde Gaper
Review Text: The place has good ambiance. They played good music  (American eighties pop) and the service was friendly. However,  the food was just fair. I ordered a club sandwich. The bread was overly dry and crusty. I also had onion rings which were …

Name: Vergulde Gaper
Review Text: Really good meal and one of the best lamb sausages I have had in a while. Friendly and quick service on the west canal side.

Name: Vergulde Gaper
Review Text: Cool local bar/restaurant based on an antique drug store theme. Staff is friendly, food is good, and it's quirky ambiance has a humours touch.

Name: Vergulde Gaper
Review Text: Really friendly staff and nice setting. Needed somewhere to have a nice rest after walking around and this was the perfect place. Very relaxing with good range of drinks and some nice nibbles. Will definitely be back.

Name: Vergulde Gaper
Review Text: Nice place by the canal, decent choice of beer. Was there in a sunday afternoon and it was nice and quite, perfect to chill with a cold beer. Food looked nice too, though we didn't have any. Mostly locals when i was there. Friendly staff. Recommended.

Name: Vergulde Gaper
Review Text: Ok place for eating and drinking. The food is good, service is ok. Nothing too special, just normal.

Name: Vergulde Gaper
Review Text: Amazing, the waiter was really nice. I had the most amazing meal and i don’t think there could be anything else that would make this restaurant even better.

Name: Vergulde Gaper
Review Text: Very good sandwiches and atmosphere! I recommend.

Name: Vergulde Gaper
Review Text: Cosy atmosphere in cold winter months, simple but tasty food!

Name: Vergulde Gaper
Review Text: Travelers, we stopped here for lunch and it was perfect. The atmosphere is lovely, very European. Small and intimate. And charming. The food was good too. The sandwiches were delicious and the salads were fresh with a nice housemade dressing. It was a wonderful place. We recommend.  Enjoy.

Name: Vergulde Gaper
Review Text: Personable, friendly service! Our attendant offered the local beers as a unique taste into Amsterdam, but we were set on the mimosas! Nice atmosphere and cool little neighborhood pub.

Name: Vergulde Gaper
Review Text: Really liked the vibe of the place. You can hear yourself think. No “kid” menu but well-behaved  kiddos (ours was kept busy with coloring books) having a plain burger will do just fine. I had the special pork tenderloin plate and it was …

Name: Vergulde Gaper
Review Text: This looks like so many other restaurant / pubs from the outside that it would be easy to miss.  There was outside seating across the street right on the canal to enjoy the views.  As outside seating was full due to great weather we enjoyed …

Name: Vergulde Gaper
Review Text:
This cozy corner place is friendly and inviting.
Great friendly service and delicious soup and cappuccino.  The food wasn't so great though, it needed a bit of traste and flavor. …

Name: Vergulde Gaper
Review Text: Honestly one of the best burgers i have ever had. Always visit when i am in Amsterdam  it is definitely a must. Will continue to bring my friends and family here. Atmosphere is quaint and the interior design is very quirky with its own character! 5/5

Name: Vergulde Gaper
Review Text: Very nice little cafe. Great for people watching.

Name: Vergulde Gaper
Review Text: Nice quayside location. Decent food. Good bitterballen. Had satay chicken with was mediocre and more sir h than Asian. Served with french fries and mayo. Good selection of beers.

Name: Vergulde Gaper
Review Text: Nice place with tasty food. Try the chicken satay and fried Dutch specialties.

Name: Vergulde Gaper
Review Text: Simply the best burger in the city, the bar is nice and very authentic to the city of Amsterdam a perfect mix between the old vibe of the city with a modern take on it. It is not a burger bar, that have one burger only on their menu but without a doubt it is the best burger of Amsterdam

Name: Vergulde Gaper
Review Text:
The staff were very chilled, welcoming and attentive.
Nice bar snacks....try the Bitterballen. The burger was a tasty delight and massive!

Name: Vergulde Gaper
Review Text: It was a total surprise. In a good way.  Food was delicious and I loved the ambience.  Staff were very efficient, friendly and helpful.  Make sure to book ahead.  Its worth it.

Name: Vergulde Gaper
Review Text:
Good value for money!  Very nice food! Limited menu but still enough to choose from even for a vegeatarian. Cosy atmosphere, nice view when your are outside or by the window.
1 minus: Staff good be better!

Name: Vergulde Gaper
Review Text:
bar located in front of my house, i go there to enjoy the sun until late at night on their perfect terrace !
service is good, beer is fresh.
not disapointed by the mix of nuts

Name: Vergulde Gaper
Review Text: Nice friendly staff and perfect location by the canal. The food is very basic though (don't expect too much) and the toilets were messy. Nice place to meet friends for a drink but it could be more...

Name: Vergulde Gaper
Review Text: Great choice in beers and food. Good place for a quick cup of coffee. Live music plays well with the ambience of the place. Local favourite for years.

Name: Vergulde Gaper
Review Text: Excellent spot on the canal for drinks. Staff are friendly and the food is fantastic. They do normal food, but really well. A hidden gem!

Name: Vergulde Gaper
Review Text: Lovely bar, good food and drink. Friendly staff. Rather quiet, but that's what we were looking for whilst we were waiting for our train.

Name: Vergulde Gaper
Review Text: Good delicious food, selection of beers and vine, friendly staff, inexpensive bill, center of the city, what else? Yet another pub but a very good one

Name: Vergulde Gaper
Review Text: Made a stop for a pint and a snack. Staff was friendly and helped explain options. Had our best beer of the night there!

Name: Vergulde Gaper
Review Text:
Perfect place for a breakfast after a hard night's party, I highly recommend to end the meal with a beer and cheese sticks with sweet chili sauce.
Have been visiting this place a couple of times and it's always charming and  with good service!

Name: Vergulde Gaper
Review Text: Lots of nice beers to choose from. The food was good. Restaurant was very understaffed so the service was very slow. Waiters were very nice though

Name: Vergulde Gaper
Review Text: Nice bar, great staff we  enjoyed a leisurely drink and chat with friends.  would definitely go back

Name: Vergulde Gaper
Review Text: Got a cosy wee table by the window here, just for a few drinks before dinner. We could have stayed for something to eat, but the menu here is a bit on the snacky side and we wanted a bigger meal.

Name: Vergulde Gaper
Review Text: Really friendly staff who helped us taste some local beers. Food is really good too.

Name: Vergulde Gaper
Review Text: Tasty fries and cozy lovely locals atmosphere. But yes, the toilets are wretched.

Name: Vergulde Gaper
Review Text: Really like this place. Had great meal, nice vibe and very good service from the staff

Name: Vergulde Gaper
Review Text: It's May. Get here at 3pm, grab a table and wait for the sun to poke round the corner. Lots of Cycles, 1 or 2 cars, relax in a small pocket of Dutch heaven.

Name: Vergulde Gaper
Review Text: Weekends it's packed with couch surfers and white name tags, it's very loud if that's ur type of thing and meant for foreigners, prices are ok but terraces closed after 12 and ur forced in LOL

Name: Vergulde Gaper
Review Text: Nice and relaxing view hanging out with mates here

Name: Vergulde Gaper
Review Text: Good food, nice selection of beers on tap. Stairs to the toilets are a bit of a sobriety test!

Name: Vergulde Gaper
Review Text: Recommendation: get the bread spread. Comes with a variety of tasty breads with hummus, pesto, and mayonnaise. Perfect appetizer with a drink.

Name: Vergulde Gaper
Review Text: Very comfortable and friendly with a nice comfortable menu.  Good beer, friendly staff.

Name: Vergulde Gaper
Review Text: Spicy deep fried meat spring rolls are really good as well as the Tripel Leffe beer

Name: Vergulde Gaper
Review Text: Always visit this bar when I visit Amsterdam. Great location, good food, beer and friendly atmosphere.

Name: Vergulde Gaper
Review Text: Nice place to catch the last sun rays of the day with a glass of wine or some beer. Friendly staff

Name: Vergulde Gaper
Review Text: Nice experience and tasty food. Good vibe to the place with friendly staff.

Name: Vergulde Gaper
Review Text: Nice location. Staff could've been more aware/caring about their visitors

Name: Vergulde Gaper
Review Text: Phenomenal burger, good ambience, great service, scary stairs to the toilet.

Name: Vergulde Gaper
Review Text: Nice enough place. Just had a few drinks outside. Nothing super memorable

Name: Vergulde Gaper
Review Text: Whether you are looking for a good breakfast, nice lunch or a cozy diner this place meets all requirements.

Review Text: We could see this place from our house boat. Cool outdoor seating and good food

Review Text: Very good food and nice atmosphere

Review Text: I love how the very local Jordaan neighbourhood people mix with the tourists here. The service is great!
